metadata.title: Evaluate to true if the ind-def:textfilecontent54_test is properly supported.
metadata.description: This definition is intended to evalutate to true if the interpreter properly supports the ind-def:textfilecontent54_test.

notes.note: It is important to note that the values used in this test definition are specific to a particular machine, and may not necessarily apply to your system. As a result, in order to have the definition return a result of 'true', you must either change these values to the ones found on your particular system, or you must configure your system to use these values.

criterion.comment: Test that the textfilecontent54_object with a path, filename, line, and instance is supported.
Test that the textfilecontent54_object with a path pattern match, filename, line, and instance is supported.
Test that the textfilecontent54_object with a path, filename pattern match, line, and instance is supported.
Test that the max_depth behavior is supported for a limited depth of recursion.
Test that the max_depth behavior is supported for a unlimited depth of recursion.
Test that the recurse direction behavior is supported.
Test that the ignore_case behavior is supported.
Test that the singleline behavior is supported.
Test that the multiline behavior is supported.

textfilecontent54_test.comment: Test that the textfilecontent54_object with a path, filename, line, and instance is supported.
Test that the textfilecontent54_object with a path pattern match, filename, line, and instance is supported.
Test that the textfilecontent54_object with a path, filename pattern match, line, and instance is supported.
Test that the max_depth behavior is supported for a limited depth of recursion.
Test that the max_depth behavior is supported for a unlimited depth of recursion.
Test that the recurse direction behavior is supported.
Test that the ignore_case behavior is supported.
Test that the singleline behavior is supported.
Test that the multiline behavior is supported.

textfilecontent54_object.comment: This textfilecontent54_object retrieves all lines that match the regular expression 'OVAL Interpreter' in the file where the path equals '/tmp/ValidationSupportFiles/TextFiles/TextFileContentTest', the filename equals 'build.win32.txt', and the instance is greater than or equal to '1'.

This textfilecontent54_object retrieves all lines that match the regular expression 'OVAL Interpreter' in the file where the path matches the regular expression '^/tmp/ValidationSupportFiles/.+', the filename equals 'build.win32.txt', and the instance is greater than or equal to '1'.

This textfilecontent54_object retrieves all lines that match the regular expression 'OVAL Interpreter' in the file where the path equals '/tmp/ValidationSupportFiles/TextFiles/TextFileContentTest', the filename matches the regular expression 'build.win[0-9]{2}\.txt', and the instance is greater than or equal to '1'.

This textfilecontent54_object retrieves all lines that match the regular expression 'OVAL Interpreter' in the file where the path equals '/tmp/ValidationSupportFiles/TextFiles', recursing down one level, the filename equals 'build.win32.txt', and the instance is greater than or equal to '1'.

This textfilecontent54_object retrieves all lines that match the regular expression 'OVAL Interpreter' in the file where the path equals '/tmp/ValidationSupportFiles', recursing down infinitely, the filename equals 'build.win32.txt', and the instance is greater than or equal to '1'.

This textfilecontent54_object retrieves all lines that match the regular expression 'OVAL Interpreter' in the file where the path equals '/tmp/ValidationSupportFiles/TextFiles/TextFileContentTest/SubTextFileContentTest', recursing up one level, the filename equals 'build.win32.txt', and the instance is greater than or equal to '1'.

This textfilecontent54_object retrieves all lines that match the regular expression 'oval interpreter', where case is ignored, in the file where the path equals '/tmp/ValidationSupportFiles/TextFiles/TextFileContentTest', recursing up one level, the filename equals 'build.win32.txt', and the instance is greater than or equal to '1'.

This textfilecontent54_object retrieves all lines that match the regular expression 'OVAL Interpreter', where '.' matches the newline character, in the file where the path equals '/tmp/ValidationSupportFiles/TextFiles/TextFileContentTest', recursing up one level, the filename equals 'build.win32.txt', and the instance is greater than or equal to '1'.

This textfilecontent54_object retrieves all lines that match the regular expression 'OVAL Interpreter', where the input string is treated as multiple lines, in the file where the path equals '/tmp/ValidationSupportFiles/TextFiles/TextFileContentTest', recursing up one level, the filename equals 'build.win32.txt', and the instance is greater than or equal to '1'.
textfilecontent54_object.pattern: To report a problem.*OVAL Definitions document that was used.

textfilecontent54_state.comment: This textfilecontent54_state represents a textfilecontent54_item where the path equals '/tmp/ValidationSupportFiles/TextFiles/TextFileContentTest', filename equals 'build.win32.txt', pattern matches the regular expression 'OVAL Interpreter', instance is greater than or equal to '1', and text equals '^OVAL Interpreter$'.

This textfilecontent54_state represents a textfilecontent54_item where the path equals '/tmp/ValidationSupportFiles/TextFiles/TextFileContentTest/', filename equals 'build.win32.txt', pattern matches the regular expression 'OVAL Interpreter', instance is greater than or equal to '1', and text equals 'OVAL Interpreter'.

This textfilecontent54_state represents a textfilecontent54_item where the path equals '/tmp/ValidationSupportFiles/TextFiles/TextFileContentTest', filename equals 'build.win32.txt', pattern matches the regular expression 'oval interpreter', instance is greater than or equal to '1', and text matches the regular expression '(OVAL Interpreter|OVAL INTERPRETER)'.

This textfilecontent54_state represents a textfilecontent54_item where the path equals '/tmp/ValidationSupportFiles/TextFiles/TextFileContentTest', filename equals 'build.win32.txt', pattern matches the regular expression 'To report a problem.*definitions file.', instance is greater than or equal to '1', and text matches the regular expression 'OVAL Definition Interpreter'.
